Name: Knight Story
About the game: Black and white 2D platformer about a knight's journey. The player can control the knight, jump, run, climb walls. The task is to kill all the enemies on the level in order to open the entrance to the next level. The knight has two weapons, a sword for close combat and stars for ranged attacks. The number of stars is limited. Also, by destroying plants, you can find an increase in life and be treated. More than 20 levels and bosses are available.
